}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "NFA222", "250-02471-020", "E85792" and "1432-01" (08/2014) :is silkscreened on the front of the module in the photos. *[[Foxconn T77H348.20]] REV.O GP/HF, P/N: 2204003543-03L2 ([http://www.ebay.com/itm/111935969227 Ebay]) *[[Lite-On WCBN802A]]-AD M.2 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2371257 FCC] OUI: B8:EE:65)
